content: quote: Originally posted by Anbar7: Just because you hold demonstrations to oust your Pres. does not mean you are a communist. I assume that if a million or so outraged Republicans demand Obama resign, and we hold a new election, you would back them? Finally of course your last remark - Neat trick getting a 100,000 Ossetians to march - They don't have that many people in the whole "country." Dave
